codeEditor.showMinimapDesc: Display a minimap for easier navigation in diff view
codeEditor.showLineNumbersDesc: Display line numbers in the editor

tools.allowedToolsDesc: Tools that are automatically allowed without prompting for permission

cursor.skipPermissionsDesc: Equivalent to -f flag in Cursor CLI

tasks.title: TaskMaster

api.title: API Keys & Tokens
api.description: Manage your API keys and authentication tokens

quickSettings.title: Quick Settings
quickSettings.sendByCtrlEnterDesc: When enabled, pressing Ctrl+Enter will send the message instead of just Enter. This is useful for IME users to avoid accidental sends.

commands./help: Show help documentation for Claude Code
commands./model: Switch or view the current AI model
commands./cost: Display token usage and cost information
commands./memory: Open CLAUDE.md memory file for editing
commands./status: Show system status and version information
commands./rewind: Rewind the conversation to a previous state

projectWizard.title: Create New Project
projectWizard.chooseType: Do you already have a workspace, or would you like to create a new one?
projectWizard.existingWorkspaceDesc: I already have a workspace on my server and just need to add it to the project list
projectWizard.newWorkspaceDesc: Create a new workspace, optionally clone from a GitHub repository
projectWizard.selectTypeError: Please select whether you have an existing workspace or want to create a new one
projectWizard.pathHelpExisting: Full path to your existing workspace directory
projectWizard.pathHelpNew: Full path where the new workspace will be created
projectWizard.githubUrlHelp: Leave empty to create an empty workspace, or provide a GitHub URL to clone
projectWizard.githubAuthDesc: Only required for private repositories. Public repos can be cloned without authentication.
projectWizard.tokenOnlyForOperation: This token will be used only for this operation
projectWizard.publicRepoTipDesc: don't require authentication. You can skip providing a token if cloning a public repo.
projectWizard.noStoredTokens: No stored tokens available. You can add tokens in Settings â†’ API Keys for easier reuse.
projectWizard.confirmExisting: The workspace will be added to your project list and will be available for Claude/Cursor sessions.
projectWizard.confirmNewWithRepo: A new workspace will be created and the repository will be cloned from GitHub.
projectWizard.confirmNewEmpty: An empty workspace directory will be created at the specified path.

mainContent.selectProject: Select a project to start chatting
mainContent.chooseProjectDesc: Select a project from the sidebar to start coding with Claude. Each project contains your chat sessions and file history.
mainContent.tipMobile: Tap the menu button above to access projects
mainContent.tipDesktop: Create a new project by clicking the folder icon in the sidebar

common.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this MCP server?

gitStep.nameHelper: This will be used as: git config --global user.name
gitStep.emailHelper: This will be used as: git config --global user.email

setupForm.errorPasswordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
